discussion.content: Are the threshold values supposed to be 0?

Selected Answer: B
The problem is in the hard drive.

Too Hot CPU just like you 
source: https://www.avast.com/c-how-to-check-cpu-temperature

comments.content: LOL! If it was hot like be the computer would be on fire!

choices.B: The integrity of the hard drive

comments.content: I agree, it cannot be print spooler cause he get to print remotely if he didn't get to print it would've been the printer cache.
Same here, early stages of troubleshooting is to always check and avoid doing anything at least until stage 1 where you are still gathering info

discussion.content:
I think the answer is B and E. If the technician can print properly it is very likely that the user in the active directory is not assigned the correct permission. 

Anyway, at this stage of troubleshooting, you should gather as much information as possible so that means "checking" the configuration settings and AD users account setting

choices.D: Clear the print queue on the server
choices.F: Delete all the files from the server print spooler
choices.A: Modify the environment variables on the computer
choices.E: Check the network settings on the computer
choices.B: Check the AD account settings for the user

questions.question_text: A user is having trouble printing and has asked a technician for help. The technician is able to print remotely from the print server. Which of the following will the technician MOST likely need to perform NEXT? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: it's C, question says "wants to be able to DISPLAY a receipt and allow a customer to SIGN it"

comments.content: I agree, signature pads do not display receipts only Signatures.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Touch-screen monitor

i would agree with a signature pad because it seems like the question is trying to make you understand a signature pad is used for signatures. it's rare but there are signature pads with displays. It's practically a tablet.

questions.question_text: Which of the following peripherals would be the BEST option for a company that wants to be able to display a receipt and allow a customer to sign it?

A technician receives reports of a website that is returning errors when accessed. A programmer pushed a new version of code to the site the night before. Which of the following steps should the technician take FIRST?

comments.content: It mentions that we receive "reports". That means that we already know several users to deal with the same problem.
I agree its A because when the technician receive reports it already verify more than one users having the issue.
I also agree with A. The tech received multiple REPORTS already so next step is to Test the Theory.

discussion.content: I believe the answer is B. At this stage (identify the problem) , you should gather as much information as possible. Testing the theory doesn't come until stage 3

I will go for B. Its not sure if they are having the same errors.

A technician receives reports of a website that is returning errors when accessed
i would with B for sure and if yes i can rollback if not i will whats the problem with the user

choices.C: Ask the programmer to roll back to a previous version
choices.A: Test whether the upgrade caused the errors
choices.B: Determine if other users are receiving the same errors
choices.D: Document the findings related to the cause of the errors

questions.question_text: A company has decided to use Windows thin clients for operations. Which of the following must be done to allow changes to the computers' OS and applications?

choices.C: The disk partition must be formatted as NTFS
choices.B: The registry must be backed up to allow changes to the computer
choices.A: A separate hardware token must be used to authenticate the user

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Why NTFS? Why should it not work with FAT32?
If you do not allow changes to the configuration and reboot the VM on the server, all changes will be away.
